Name: Verify Adding Product to Cart and Proceeding to Checkout from Product Details Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the product details. Add the desired quantity to the cart and proceed to view the cart. Proceed to checkout and verify the view cart page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink view product > navigate to Page product details
step 3: At Page product details, click on input quantity
step 4: At Page product details, input on input quantity
step 5: At Page product details, click on button add to cart
step 6: At Page product details, click on hyperlink view cart > navigate to Page view cart
step 7: At Page view cart, click on hyperlink object
step 8: At Page view cart, click on hyperlink object
step 9: At Page view cart, click on hyperlink proceed to checkout
step 10: Add visual checkpoint at Page view cart

Name: Verify Adding Product to Cart and Continuing Shopping from Product Details Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the product details. Add the desired quantity to the cart and continue shopping. Verify the product details page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink view product > navigate to Page product details
step 3: At Page product details, click on input quantity
step 4: At Page product details, input on input quantity
step 5: At Page product details, click on button add to cart
step 6: At Page product details, click on button continue shopping
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page product details

Name: Verify Adding Saree to Cart from Women s Category
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the women's category. Select a saree and add it to the cart. Verify the category products page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink women
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink saree > navigate to Page category products
step 4: At Page category products, click on hyperlink add to cart
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page category products

Name: Verify Accessing Products from the Products Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the products page. Verify the products page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on ul object
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink products > navigate to Page products
step 4: Add visual checkpoint at Page products
